trans-unit.source: Encrypts a cookie using <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSA"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 加密 cookie 使用<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSA"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Cookies encrypted with this transform may be decrypted by any computer that shares the same RSA private key (generally associated with an X.509 certificate).
trans-unit.target: 使用此转换加密的 cookie 可能由共享相同 RSA 关联的私钥 （通常使用 X.509 证书） 的任何计算机进行解密。

trans-unit.source: The given data is encrypted using a random AES256 key.
trans-unit.target: 给定的数据使用随机的 AES256 密钥进行加密。

trans-unit.source: This key is then encrypted using RSA, and the RSA public key is sent in plain text so that when decoding the class knows which RSA key to use.
trans-unit.target: 然后使用 RSA 加密此密钥，并以纯文本发送的 RSA 公钥，以便当解码类知道要使用哪个 RSA 密钥。

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > When using the RsaEncryptionCookieTransform with a service, if a key provided by a certificate changes the service must be restarted.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!IMPORTANT]&1;> 时使用 RsaEncryptionCookieTransform 与服务，如果提供的证书密钥更改服务，必须重新启动。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.RsaEncryptionCookieTransform"></xref> class that uses the specified key for encryption and decryption.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.IdentityModel.RsaEncryptionCookieTransform"></xref>使用指定的密钥加密和解密的类。

trans-unit.source: The key to use as the default encryption and decryption key.
trans-unit.target: 要用作默认加密和解密密钥的键。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <xref:System.IdentityModel.RsaEncryptionCookieTransform.DecryptionKeys*> and <xref:System.IdentityModel.RsaEncryptionCookieTransform.EncryptionKey*> properties.
key is .
trans-unit.target: keyis .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.RsaEncryptionCookieTransform"></xref> class that uses the private key of the specified X.509 certificate for encryption and decryption.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.IdentityModel.RsaEncryptionCookieTransform"></xref>类，该类使用指定的 X.509 证书的私钥加密和解密。

trans-unit.source: The certificate whose private key is used to encrypt and decrypt.
trans-unit.target: 其私钥用于加密和解密的证书。

trans-unit.source: The certificate whose private key will be used as the default encryption and decryption key.
trans-unit.target: 将作为默认加密和解密密钥使用其私钥的证书。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <xref:System.IdentityModel.RsaEncryptionCookieTransform.DecryptionKeys*> and <xref:System.IdentityModel.RsaEncryptionCookieTransform.EncryptionKey*> properties.
certificate is .
trans-unit.target: certificateis .

trans-unit.source: certificate does not have a private key.
trans-unit.target: certificate没有私钥。

trans-unit.source: -or- The private key is not RSA.
trans-unit.target: -或者-私钥不是 RSA。

trans-unit.source: Decrypts the specified data by using the provided RSA key(s) to decrypt an AES key, which decrypts the cookie.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用提供的 RSA 密钥进行解密 AES 密钥，解密该 cookie 来解密指定的数据。

trans-unit.source: The encoded data
trans-unit.target: 编码的数据

trans-unit.source: The decoded data
trans-unit.target: 已解码的数据

trans-unit.source: encoded is .
trans-unit.target: encodedis .

trans-unit.source: encoded contains zero bytes.
trans-unit.target: encoded包含零字节。

trans-unit.source: The platform does not support the requested algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 平台不支持请求的算法。

trans-unit.source: There are no decryption keys or none of the keys match.
trans-unit.target: 没有任何解密密钥或密钥不匹配。

trans-unit.source: Gets the keys used for decryption By default, this property returns a list that contains only the encryption key.
trans-unit.target: 获取默认情况下，用于解密的密钥此属性返回包含仅加密密钥的列表。

trans-unit.source: The keys to use for decryption.
trans-unit.target: 要用于解密密钥。

trans-unit.source: Encodes the specified data.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的数据的编码。

trans-unit.source: The data is encrypted using the default encryption algorithm (AES-256), then the AES key is encrypted using RSA and the RSA public key is appended.
trans-unit.target: 对数据进行加密使用的默认加密算法 (aes-256)，然后使用 RSA 加密的 AES 密钥，并追加的 RSA 公钥。

trans-unit.source: The data to encode
trans-unit.target: 要编码的数据

trans-unit.source: The encoded data
trans-unit.target: 编码的数据

trans-unit.source: value is .
trans-unit.target: valueis .

trans-unit.source: value contains zero bytes.
trans-unit.target: value包含零字节。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.RsaEncryptionCookieTransform.EncryptionKey*> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.RsaEncryptionCookieTransform.EncryptionKey*> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.</xref:System.IdentityModel.RsaEncryptionCookieTransform.EncryptionKey*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the RSA key used for encryption
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于加密的 RSA 密钥

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.IdentityModel.RsaEncryptionCookieTransform.DecryptionKeys%2A> property to a collection that contains the same key as its only element.
trans-unit.target: 设置此属性还将设置<xref:System.IdentityModel.RsaEncryptionCookieTransform.DecryptionKeys%2A>到包含其唯一的元素与相同的密钥的集合的属性。</xref:System.IdentityModel.RsaEncryptionCookieTransform.DecryptionKeys%2A>

trans-unit.source: The RSA key used for encryption.
trans-unit.target: 用于加密的 RSA 密钥。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the hash algorithm to use.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要使用的哈希算法的名称。

trans-unit.source: SHA256 is the default algorithm.
trans-unit.target: SHA256 是默认的算法。

trans-unit.source: This may require a minimum platform of Windows Server 2003 and .NET 3.5 SP1.
trans-unit.target: 这可能需要最小平台为 Windows Server 2003 和.NET 3.5 SP1。

trans-unit.source: If SHA256 is not supported, set the HashName property to "SHA1".
trans-unit.target: 如果不支持 SHA256，HashName 属性设置为"SHA1"。

trans-unit.source: The name of the hash algorithm to use.
trans-unit.target: 要使用的哈希算法的名称。

trans-unit.source: The default is “SHA2566”.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为"SHA2566"。
